Profile Survey) Order 2021.

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: 3. This Order applies to an undertaking that is classified for statistical
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to an undertaking that is classified for statistical 
purposes under division 45 or 47 or class 56.30 of NACE Rev. 2 set out in Annex 
I to Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006 of the European Parliament and of the 
Council of 20 December 20063 as amended by Regulation (EC) No. 295/2008 

1 OJ No. L 327, 17.12.2019, p. 1. 
2 OJ L 339, 24.9.2021, p. 33. 
3 OJ No. L 393, 30.12.2006, p. 1. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 28th December, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [706] 3 

of the European Parliament and of the Council of 11 March 20084, Regulation 
(EU) No. 70/2012 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 18 January 
20125 and Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of the European Parliament and of the 
Council of 20 June 20196.

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: 4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide,
text_raw:
4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide, 
once only and for the purposes of the survey, information the general nature of 
which is specified in the Schedule is hereby prescribed. 

4 OJ No. L 97, 9.4.2008, p. 13. 
5 OJ No. L 32, 3.2.2012, p. 1. 
6 OJ No. L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 241. 

 
 
 
 4 [706]

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: Article 4
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Article 4 

Information in relation to 2021 as it relates to the undertaking concerned 
regarding the following:
text_norm: schedule article 4 information relation 2021 relates undertaking concerned regarding following

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: total annual turnover;
text_raw:
1. 

(a) 

(b) 

total annual turnover; 

either: 

(i) 

in relation to each day of the week, the percentage of the 
figure referred to in paragraph (a) that the relevant 
aggregate figure represents, or 

(ii) 

in relation to such week, occurring in the relevant period, as 
the undertaking may nominate – 

(I) 

the turnover achieved in that week, and 

(II) 

in relation to each day of that week, the percentage of 
the figure referred to in clause (I) that the turnover 
achieved on that day represents; 

(c) 

the percentage of the figure referred to in paragraph (a) that the 
turnover, achieved in 2021, in respect of each category of product 
sold by the undertaking represents.
text_norm: 1 (a) (b) total annual turnover either (i) relation day week percentage figure referred paragraph (a) relevant aggregate figure represents (ii) relation week occurring relevant period undertaking may nominate - (i) turnover achieved week (ii) relation day week percentage figure referred clause (i) turnover achieved day represents (c) percentage figure referred paragraph (a) turnover achieved 2021 respect category product sold undertaking represents

title: by section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose
heading: 2. Particulars of the time taken to complete the questionnaire, form or other
text_raw:
2. Particulars of the time taken to complete the questionnaire, form or other 
record prepared by the Director General for the collection of the information 
referred to in paragraph 1.

13 December, 2021. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN,
